message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product. I believe it's worth a significant amount to the right buyer, and I'm confident you'll appreciate its value. I'm starting with an offer of $2000000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, and I'm glad you're willing to make a serious offer. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to my initial asking price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1800000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle of your offer and my previous one, so I'm counteroffering at $1600000.

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit concerned that we're getting too far away from my initial asking price. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1700000.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'm counteroffering at $1650000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal. However, I'm not willing to go below $1750000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1725000.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'm counteroffering at $1687500.

I appreciate your continued interest in the product, Bob, and I'm glad we're still in negotiations. However, I'm not willing to go below $1725000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1700000, but this is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm afraid I'm still not willing to meet you at $1700000. My final offer is $1690000. I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price.
